txt.en: Helm's Dike
Eastern Front
'The enemy outnumbers us by the thousands. If we stand toe to toe we will lose.'
'We must leverage all our assets and strengths, including our siege weaponry.'
'There are a couple of other pieces of siege deployed here, and some crated up you can deploy yourself.'
'They are complicated machines, a great many things can be done to and with them.'
'Get some practice with this small ballista while we have a few moments.'
'Engineering Promotions will expand your options and efficacy.'
'Our troops have drilled and prepared themselves for this day.'

Helm's Dike forms the first barrier of defence for Rohan's final stand. Saruman's army marches, angry and ready for war.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Soldier defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Commander defeated
- Banner burned
'We group up in squads where commanders will relay your orders.'
The defenders of the Hornburg are busy preparing for the onslaught that will soon begin. Those left at the Dike must buy them as much time as possible.
[placeholder] Banners Burned
'If you wish, try telling me some orders to deliver to my men.'
'Through Promotions you can improve the impact of the orders you deliver.'
'We have setup a few ladders we commandeered from the enemy.'
'We probably won't see any here at the Dike, but many will be raised before the night is through.'
'Making sure you know how to get rid of them would be wise.'
Western Flank
The crates here contain siege weaponry and barricades engineers can deploy.
Defend the Dike and buy the primary defence time
Gamling must survive
Speak to Gamling when you are ready to begin
[placeholder] Soldiers Defeated
[placeholder] Commanders Defeated
Centre Front
